subdisciplines.name: Computational theory of mind
subdisciplines.description: The study of the mind as an information processor.

subdisciplines.name: Consciousness studies
subdisciplines.description: The study of subjective experience and qualia.

subdisciplines.name: Intentionality
subdisciplines.description: The study of the mind's ability to be about something.

subdisciplines.name: Philosophical psychology
subdisciplines.description: The study of psychological phenomena using philosophical methods.

subdisciplines.name: Philosophy of perception
subdisciplines.description: The study of perception and the mechanisms of perception.
